attributes.action: Make all recreational companies/organisations such as Theme Parks, Tourist Attractions, Cinemas etc recognise the age of an adult as 18, and their pricing structure to reflect this
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition, if accepted and acted upon, would ensure that children (under 18) pay much cheaper prices for recreation etc going to the cinema, theme park, tourist attraction etc. This would make it much more affordable for children (or parents/guardians who may be paying for a child's activities) to spend time enjoying some of our nation's greatest assets, and not loitering on streets as is the cheaper option.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
